$block: Access token details that are currently associated with this user

$ul: **client_id**: Client ID that is associated with the user
**contributor_id**: Contributor ID that is associated with the user
**customer_id**: Customer ID that is associated with the user
**expires_in**: Number of seconds until the access token expires; no expiration if this value is null
**organization_id**: Organization ID that is associated with the user
**scopes**: Scopes that this access token provides when used as authentication
**user_id**: User ID that is associated with the user
**username**: User name that is associated with the user
